items.title: LM2596s DC-DC 3A
items.subtitle: Step-Down Voltage Regulator

seo.description: LM2596s - Step-Down Voltage Regulator up to 3A

items.content: The LM2596s voltage regulator is designed to step down voltage by adjusting with an adjustable resistor.

items.title: BMP280
items.subtitle: Sensor for temperature measurement, etc.

seo.description: BMP280 - Sensor for Temperature, Pressure, and Humidity Measurement
seo.keywords: sensor, bmp280, bosch, temperature, pressure, humidity

items.content: BMP280 is an absolute barometric pressure sensor specially designed for mobile applications. The BMP280 sensor module is housed in an extremely compact package. Its small size and low power consumption make it suitable for battery-powered devices.

items.title: MPU-9250
items.subtitle: Gyroscope/Accelerometer/Magnetometer

seo.description: MPU-9250 - Gyroscope, Accelerometer, and Magnetometer in One Device
seo.keywords: mpu-9250, invensense, gyroscope, accelerometer, magnetometer, dmp, i2c

items.content:
MPU-9250 is a 9-axis motion tracking device that combines a 3-axis gyroscope, a 3-axis accelerometer, a 3-axis magnetometer, and a Digital Motion Processor™ (DMP), all in a small 3x3x1mm package, available as a pin-compatible upgrade from the MPU-6515.

With its dedicated I²C sensor bus, the MPU-9250 directly provides full 9-axis MotionFusion™ output. The MPU-9250 motion tracking device with its 9-axis integration, built-in MotionFusion™ engine, and runtime calibration firmware enables manufacturers to eliminate the costly and complex selection, qualification, and system level integration of discrete devices in motion-enabled products.

items.title: CCS811
items.subtitle: Air Quality Sensor

seo.keywords: sensor, co2, air quality, particles, voc, tvoc

items.content: CCS811 is an ultra-low-power digital gas sensor solution for detecting low levels of VOCs typically found indoors, with a microcontroller (MCU) and an analog-to-digital converter (ADC) to monitor the local environment and provide an indication of indoor air quality via an equivalent CO2 or TVOC output over a standard digital I²C interface.

externalLinks.name: ESPHome CCS811 CO2 and Volatile Organic Compound Sensor Component

items.title: APDS-9960
items.subtitle: RGB Color Sensor and Gesture Recognition

seo.description: APDS-9960 RGB color sensor and gesture recognition

items.content: With this sensor, you can control any device where gesture or color reaction can be applied. The sensor uses red, green, blue, and clear sensors with an IR LED for proximity and gesture sensing. The RGB and ambient light sensing measurements detect light intensity under various lighting conditions and materials. A built-in UV-IR filter provides precise measurements of light intensity and its corresponding color temperature. For gesture detection, it uses 4 directional photodiodes integrated with a visible light filter to accurately sense simple gestures up, down, right, left, or slightly complex ones. Micro-optical lenses have been added to the module to provide high-efficiency transmission and reception of IR radiation. An internal controller puts the sensor into a low-power mode between RGBC, proximity, and gesture measurements, resulting in very low power consumption. Jumper Settings: - PS - This jumper connects the power sources of the sensor and IR LED. When soldered, you only need to provide power to the VCC pin to power both the sensor and the IR LED. If unsoldered, you need to provide power to the VCC (2.4-3.6V) and VL (3.0-4.5V) pins separately. This jumper is soldered by default; - I²C PU - This is a 3-position solder jumper used to connect or disconnect the I²C pull-up resistors. By default, this jumper is soldered, which means the SDA and SCL lines have pull-up resistors connected on the breakout board. Use a solder wick to desolder the jumper if you do not need the pull-up resistors (e.g., you have pull-up resistors located on the I²C bus somewhere else).

items.title: MAC Series 35
items.subtitle: Electromagnetically Controlled Solenoid

seo.description: MAC 35 series - 35A solenoid with electromagnetically controlled operation
seo.keywords: mac, solenoid, boost, vacuum, pressure, control, electromagnet

items.content: Model: 35A-ACA-DDBA-1BA Port: 1/8BSP Fittings Dia: 6mm The kit includes: - 1x Solenoid valve - 2x Pagoda Fitting - 1x Muffler

items.title: TEC1-12715
items.subtitle: Peltier Element 40x40x4mm, up to 136W

seo.description: TEC1-12715 - Peltier element with a power of up to 136W

items.warningContent: Do not allow the hot side of the thermoelectric element to exceed 50°C, as the thermoelectric element will fail within 1-2 minutes of operation without heat dissipation.

items.title: BHI260AP
items.subtitle: Intelligent Sensor

seo.keywords: bhi260ap, sensor, ai, microcontroller, gyroscope, accelerometer, machine learning

items.content: BHI260AP is an ideal comprehensive solution for always-on sensor devices, such as physical activity tracking, pedestrian position tracking, machine learning analytics, and orientation estimation. BHI260AP is an intelligent sensor that incorporates a wide range of software functions, a 32-bit programmable microcontroller, and a 6-axis IMU in a single package.

items.title: nRF24L01+
items.subtitle: 2.4 GHz Transceiver and Audio Streamer

seo.description: nRF24L01+ - 2.4 GHz transceiver and audio streamer

items.content: nRF24L01+ is a single-chip 2.4 GHz transceiver with a built-in Enhanced ShockBurst™ protocol engine, suitable for ultra-low-power wireless applications. nRF24L01+ is designed to operate in the worldwide ISM frequency band from 2.4 to 2.4835 GHz.

items.title: ESP8266EX
items.subtitle: Wi-Fi Chip

seo.description: ESP8266EX - Wi-Fi chip for IoT solutions

items.content: Espressif ESP8266EX is a highly integrated Wi-Fi SoC solution that meets the constant needs of users in efficient power usage, compact design, and reliable performance in the IoT industry. With complete and autonomous Wi-Fi networking capabilities, ESP8266EX can operate either as a standalone application or as a slave to a host MCU. When ESP8266EX hosts the application, it boots directly from an external flash. The built-in high-speed cache helps to increase system performance and optimize system memory. Additionally, ESP8266EX can be applied to any microcontroller-based design as a Wi-Fi adapter through SPI/SDIO or UART interfaces. ESP8266EX integrates antenna switches, RF Balun, power amplifiers, low-noise amplifiers, filters, and power management modules. Its compact design minimizes the PCB size and requires minimal external circuitry.

items.title: CC1310
items.subtitle: Sub-1 GHz RF Device

seo.description: CC1310 - Ultra-low power Sub-1 GHz RF device
seo.keywords: cc1310, rf, ultra-low power, economical, simplelink, zigbee, thread, ti, sub-1

items.content:
CC1310 is an economical, ultra-low power Sub-1 GHz RF device from Texas Instruments™, which is part of the SimpleLink™ microcontroller (MCU) platform.

The platform consists of Wi-Fi®, Bluetooth® Low Energy, Sub-1 GHz, Ethernet, Zigbee®, Thread, and host MCUs. All of these devices use a common, easy-to-use development environment with a single-core software development kit (SDK) and a rich set of tools.

The one-time integration of the SimpleLink platform allows users to add any combination of devices to their design out of the box, providing 100% code reuse when design requirements change.

With very low RF and MCU active current consumption, along with flexible low-power modes, the CC1310 device provides excellent battery life and enables the use of flat batteries.

items.title: CC2652P
items.subtitle: Multi-Protocol Wireless MCU

seo.keywords: cc2652p, multi-protocol, wireless, mcu, simplelink, bluetooth, zigbee, thread, ti

items.content: SimpleLink™ CC2652P is a multi-protocol wireless microcontroller (MCU) operating at 2.4 GHz, supporting Thread, Zigbee®, Bluetooth® 5.2 Low Energy, IEEE 802.15.4, IPv6-enabled smart objects (6LoWPAN), proprietary systems including TI 15.4-Stack (2.4 GHz), and parallel multi-protocol through DMM driver.

externalLinks.name: Firmware for ZigBee Coordinator RF-STAR RF-BM-2652P2

items.title: CH340
items.subtitle: USB to UART Converter
items.content: The CH340 is a versatile USB bus converter chip that seamlessly transforms USB signals into either serial or printer port functionality. In UART mode, the CH340 offers standard MODEM signals, making it ideal for expanding serial port capabilities for computers or directly upgrading from traditional serial devices to USB bus compatibility. With its flexible design and reliable performance, the CH340 simplifies connectivity solutions for a wide range of applications.
